resources.string: If this type of restriction message is displayed. So let us try to fix it.
1. Exit the app and go to the All Apps launcher. \nThen, long press and hold the \"Stealing SMS\" app and click \"App Info\" , it will redirect you to the App Info page.
2. In the top right corner of the App Info page you will see a three-dot menu. Tap on it
3. Now you will find the option \"Permission Restricted Settings\" Click on it. \nThis should be enough to remove the restriction.
4. Then come back and click on the \'Notification Access\' switch to enable the notification access.
Permission is Blocked. Please allow this permission in App Settings.
